oommfdecode.matlabifyArray(self.array, self.headers, self.extraCaptures,
    self.filename)
e = spio.loadmat(self.filename)
np.testing.assert_array_equal(e['OOMMFData'], np.array([[1.0, 2.0, 3.0]]))
self.assertEqual(e['Capture2'], np.array(['two']))
self.assertEqual(e['Capture1'], np.array([[1]]))
np.testing.assert_array_equal(e['GridSize'], np.array([[1.0, 2.0, 3.0]]))
